Body:
i'm trying to set variable in the key section of the labels when creating google_compute_instance

this is possible:

labels {
    "billing-zone"          = "${var.zone}"
  }

but this:

labels {
    "${var.zone}"          = ""
  }

is not. ( the var can be only in the value section ) is there anyway to pass that?

Thank you.
Title: terraform google_compute_instance - set variables instead of static labels

comments.Text: it's not working, and mine is a bit different its in the labels and not in the tags

filtered-sentences.text: i'm trying to set variable in the key section of the labels when creating google_compute_instance" this is possible: labels { "billing-zone" = "${var.zone}" } but this: labels { "${var.zone}" = "" } is not. ( the var can be only in the value section ) is there anyway to pass that?
